title: Reviews about hostel at banashankari campus
content: Please give your reviews about the hostel for boys

comments.body:
Hostel-lite for 4 years, so here it is  
\> Strict

\> Annoying

\> Fun People

\> Decent Food

\> Slightly difficult to have some "fun" time (will get easier as you learn the ways xD)
Could you be a little more elaborate 😭🤏
